title: [QUESTION] How can I add a skiasharp view to the MainPage.xaml?
body:
How can I add a skiasharp view to the MainPage.xaml?
I tried to add 

    <skia:SKCanvasView x:Name="skiaView" PaintSurface="OnPaintSurface"
                       EnableTouchEvents="True" Touch="OnTouch"
                       IgnorePixelScaling="True" />

but I do not know how to add the namespace.

Thanks
Vaclav
